title: Car Pickup & Delivery Service
subtitle: Convenient Door-to-Door Car Service Solutions
description: No time to visit a workshop? Our pickup service brings professional car care to your location. We collect your car, service it at verified workshops, and deliver it back to you.

process.title: How Our Pickup Service Works
process.subtitle: Hassle-free car service from the comfort of your home or office

steps.title: 1. Schedule Pickup
steps.description: Book a convenient pickup time and location. Tell us what service your car needs and we'll handle the rest.

steps.title: 2. Professional Collection
steps.description: Our certified driver arrives at your location with proper documentation and safely collects your vehicle.

steps.title: 3. Workshop Service
steps.description: Your car is taken to a verified partner workshop where qualified technicians perform the required services.

steps.title: 4. Safe Delivery
steps.description: Once service is complete, we deliver your car back to your specified location with detailed service report.

items.title: Time Saving
items.description: No need to wait at workshops or rearrange your schedule. We handle everything while you focus on your day.

items.title: Insured Transport
items.description: Full insurance coverage during pickup, service, and delivery for complete peace of mind.

items.title: Flexible Locations
items.description: Pickup and delivery anywhere within our service area - home, office, or any convenient location.

items.title: Quality Guarantee
items.description: All services performed at verified workshops with our platform's quality assurance guarantee.

cta.title: Ready for Hassle-Free Car Service?
cta.description: Schedule your pickup today and let us take care of everything
